attributes.action: return the Union Jack to its previous honours.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Sadly with the growing Multiculturalism of the united kingdoms I feel that I must request the Union Jack, the former great flag of the United Kingdoms is returned to its former greatness. Rather than multiculturalism destroying our national holidays and calling any kind of patriotism 'Racism' due to various offences to islam and other Non-English faith's. I don't want racism. I simply don't wish to be mocked or arrested for patriotism and support of the united kingdoms its flag and all of its glory.

God Bless the Queen

rejection.details: It is not clear what you are requesting. Please rephrase your petition and resubmit.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
